section.title: Installation
section.para:
Do the installation of the TextMarker workbench as follows:
Download, install and start an Eclipse instance in version 3.7. Eclipse can be obtained from the eclipse.org download site.
Add the Apache UIMA update site ( http://www.apache.org/dist/uima/eclipse-update-site/
) and the TextMarker update site ( TODO ) to the available software sites in your Eclipse installation. Click Help → Install New Software → Add...
and add each site.
Select the TextMarker update site at "Work with" and select "Contact all update sites during install to find required software"
Select the Apache UIMA TextMarker Eclipse tooling and runtime support
feature and continue the dialog. Eclipse will automatically install the required Apache UIMA (version 2.4.1) plugins and the DLTK Core Framework (version 3.0) plugins.
After the successful installation, switch to the TextMarker perspective. To get an overview see .
